name.japanese: トラファルガー・D・ワーテル・ロー

keyMoments.title: Law Revealed as Shichibukai on Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: Law is revealed to be the mysterious figure working with Caesar Clown on Punk Hazard, now holding the position of Shichibukai.
keyMoments.significance: First post-timeskip appearance showing Law's elevated status and setting up his alliance with Luffy.
keyMoments.quote: Trafalgar Law... So you're the one who's been on this island.

keyMoments.title: Law's 100 Hearts Revealed
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Law obtained his Shichibukai position by delivering 100 pirate hearts to the World Government.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Law's ruthlessness and the extent of his surgical abilities, as well as his strategic planning.
keyMoments.quote: He sent one hundred pirate hearts to the World Government to get his position as a Warlord of the Sea.

keyMoments.title: Law Uses Enhanced Tact Ability
keyMoments.description: Law demonstrates his significantly increased power by using Room and Tact to lift an entire Marine warship.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Law's tremendous growth during the timeskip and the scale of his Devil Fruit mastery.

abilities.description: Creates a spherical territory where Law can manipulate anything within it.
Allows Law to telekinetically move objects within his Room, including lifting massive structures like warships.

relationships.description: Law confronts Smoker on Punk Hazard, preventing the Marines from escaping and preparing to battle.

evolutionMoments.description: Law and Smoker prepare to fight after Law lifts the Marine warship.

reveals.information: Became a Shichibukai by delivering 100 pirate hearts to the World Government
Can use Tact to lift massive objects like warships within his Room
Is working with Caesar Clown on Punk Hazard

keyMoments.title: Smoker Confronts Law
keyMoments.description: Smoker discovers Law on Punk Hazard and confronts him about his presence on the forbidden island.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the conflict between the Marines and Law, with Smoker investigating the island's dark secrets.
keyMoments.quote: Trafalgar Law... So you're the one who's been on this island.

keyMoments.title: Smoker Prepares to Fight Law
keyMoments.description: Recognizing that his men cannot handle Law's Devil Fruit abilities, Smoker readies himself for personal combat.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Smoker's courage and tactical awareness in facing a Shichibukai.
keyMoments.quote: My men can't handle you because of your Devil Fruit. I'll fight you myself.

keyMoments.title: Franky Tank Debut
keyMoments.description: Franky demonstrates his new tank tread ability, delighting the rescued children.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky's post-timeskip upgrades and his ability to connect with the children.

abilities.description: Franky produces tank treads from his legs, allowing him to move like a miniature tank.

reveals.information: Can deploy tank treads from his legs for enhanced mobility

keyMoments.title: Discovery of Frozen Prisoners
keyMoments.description: Nami discovers a horrifying room filled with frozen people in prison garments.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals more of Punk Hazard's dark past and the cruelty of the experiments conducted there.
keyMoments.quote: What is this place? These people... they're frozen!

keyMoments.title: Centaurs Attack Luffy's Group
keyMoments.description: Brownbeard's centaur forces attack Luffy, Zoro, Usopp, and Robin.
keyMoments.significance: Continues to establish Brownbeard as an antagonist working under Caesar Clown.
